title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
description: I worked on coding for an Instructional Explanations Project on education research on Mathematical teaching in elementary schools. I also explored Natural Language Processing research for translating speech to text for research data on measuring the conceptual teaching of mathematics.

title: Data Research Analyst
description: I worked with a team of data scientists to craft research-based data modules using Pyret. I worked on collecting and analyzing Colleges in the US data for Bootstrap:Data Science's teaching curriculum.

title: Research Assistant and Educator
description: I researched synaptic plasticity, divisions of the central nervous system, and the effects of sleep on declarative and nondeclarative memory with a team of scientists at Sunovion. I also helped develop and teach a course on the brain and memory to high school students at the Advanced Math and Science Academy in Marlborough.
